thread.title: Philadelphia will host WWE Battleground July 23
thread.title_full: Philadelphia will host WWE Battleground July 23

author: Vaughn Johnson
title: Philadelphia will host WWE Battleground July 23
text:
Philadelphia will host WWE Battleground July 23 Updated: March 28, 2017 — 6:04 PM EDT Share Vaughn Johnson STAFF WRITER 
Vaughn Johnson is the overnight sports producer, and also runs the "Squared Circle" blog on Philly.com, which covers the world of professional wrestling in Philadelphia and beyond. He’s interviewed dozens of people from various promotions around the world, including WWE and Ring of Honor, and has covered WrestleMania three times for Philly.com. More by Vaughn Johnson Mar 27 
Philadelphia’s wrestling calendar continued to fill up Monday night when WWE announced during its stop at the Wells Fargo Center for Raw that its Battleground pay-per-view will emanate from the city on Sunday, July 23. 
Battleground is the latest pay-per-view event WWE will hold in Philadelphia. Back in January, WWE announced that the Royal Rumble, along with NXT Takeover, Raw and Smackdown Live, would all emanate from the Wells Fargo Center in January of 2018. 
Last year’s edition of Battleground was WWE’s final pay-per-view before its brand extension came into effect in July. This year’s event, however, will be exclusive to Smackdown Live. Published: March 28, 2017 — 6:04 PM EDT Do you have a minute?...
